Articles.Content: Hello Kerbalnauts! I am CanadianTaser...A KSP rocketeer! Its great to meet you all! I heard there was roleplaying here...Where can I find that!?

It was removed a while ago, however radion has started a RP.

also, are you canadian? i am!

need any help? PM me.

Hi CanadianTaser, the Kerbal roleplay board was shut down not very long ago as it was becoming impossible to manage, and the wars and bickering were giving people the wrong impression of the game.

There have been a few attempts to revive it, all are off site and any roleplay that sneaks back here tends to degenerate quite fast, and has to be stopped by the moderation team.

So instead we have the nice new fan fiction board where people can post their pics and stories based on KSP.

Enjoy your stay and have fun

Thanks a bunch guys! Sad to hear it got shut down.

Yes! I am Canadian! I will PM if I need help, thanks for the offer!!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Sure!

Here ya go: http://krp.net78.net/index.php

Also, don\'t tase me bro!
Just remember that all roleplaying takes place off of the KSP forums, the Moderation team does not want to have to try keeping it under control any more.
